name.en: Centrifuge modeling technique and data analysis
name.ch: 離心模型試驗技術與資料分析

notice.ch: 7/1~8/28暑假開授，第一天上課日2024/7/1星期一9:00，修習本課程必須參加勞檢所舉辦之固定式天車訓練（訓練時間依中央大學環安中心安排為準）

remark.ch: 7/1~8/28暑假開授，第一天上課日2024/7/1星期一9:00，修習本課程必須參加勞檢所舉辦之固定式天車訓練（訓練時間依中央大學環安中心安排為準）

goal.ch:
1. 講授離心模型試驗原理與技術，以及相關數據之分析與處理方式。
2. 介紹該試驗技術在大地工程之應用，使學生瞭解如何以物理模型探討土壤結構互制行為、土壤液化、邊坡穩定、地工構造物動態反應及災害防治對策之效益研究。
3. 熟悉離心模型試驗準備、飛行模擬過程、試驗後處理、試驗結果分析"
goal.en:
1. Introducing the principle of centrifuge modeling technique and the data analysis methods. 
2. Introducing the application of centrifuge modeling on the soil-structure interaction, soil liquefaction, slope stability, dynamic response of structures, and the effectiveness study of countermeasures for disaster mitigation.
3. Understanding the model preparation processes, centrifuge modeling, data analysis, and post-test process."

outline.ch:
1. 離心模型試驗原理
2. 離心模型試驗技術
3. 試驗準備程序
4. 離心模型試驗飛行程序與控制軟體操作
5. 試驗後處理
6. 工具操作訓練
7. 分析軟體操作"
outline.en:
1. Concept and principle of centrifuge modeling
2. Centrifuge modeling technique
3. Preparation process
4. Control of monitor and data acquisition systems
5. Post-test processing
6. Tool operation training
7. Data analysis training"

textbook.ch:
1. Taylor, R. N., Geotechnical centrifuge technology, 1st edition, Chapman & Hall, 1995.
2. 授課教師準備的講義"
textbook.en:
1. Taylor, R. N., Geotechnical centrifuge technology, 1st edition, Chapman & Hall, 1995.
2. Lecture notes by instructor"

gradMethod.ch:
實習與作業: 60%
期末測驗: 40%"
gradMethod.en:
Hands-on practice and assignment: 60%
Final exam: 40%"

flexDiscription.ch: 16週週間需額外工作時間準備離心模型試驗的期末報告
flexDiscription.en: Additional working hours are necessary to prepare the final report of the centrifuge modeling test.
